verses.text: The word which came unto Jeremiah from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the days of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah , saying ,
Go unto the house of the Rechabites , and speak unto them, and bring them into the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, into one of the chambers , and give them wine to drink.
Then I took Jaazaniah the son of Jeremiah , the son of Habaziniah , and his brethren , and all his sons , and the whole house of the Rechabites ;

And I brought them into the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, into the chamber of the sons of Hanan , the son of Igdaliah , a man of God , which \add was\add* by the chamber of the princes , which \add was\add* above the chamber of Maaseiah the son of Shallum , the keeper of the door :\f + \fr 35.4 \ft door: Heb. threshold, or, vessel\f*
And I set before the sons of the house of the Rechabites pots full of wine , and cups , and I said unto them, Drink ye wine.
But they said , We will drink no wine : for Jonadab the son of Rechab our father commanded us, saying , Ye shall drink no wine , \add neither ye\add*, nor your sons for ever :

Neither shall ye build house , nor sow seed , nor plant vineyard , nor have \add any:\add* but all your days ye shall dwell in tents ; that ye may live many days in the land where ye \add be\add* strangers.
Thus have we obeyed the voice of Jonadab the son of Rechab our father in all that he hath charged us, to drink no wine all our days , we, our wives , our sons , nor our daughters ;
Nor to build houses for us to dwell in : neither have we vineyard , nor field , nor seed :
But we have dwelt in tents , and have obeyed , and done according to all that Jonadab our father commanded us.

But it came to pass, when Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon came up into the land , that we said , Come , and let us go to Jerusalem for fear of the army of the Chaldeans , and for fear of the army of the Syrians : so we dwell at Jerusalem. \p
¶ Then came the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto Jeremiah , saying ,

Thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts , the God of Israel ; Go and tell the men of Judah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem , Will ye not receive instruction to hearken to my words ? saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

The words of Jonadab the son of Rechab , that he commanded his sons not to drink wine , are performed ; for unto this day they drink none, but obey their father’s commandment : notwithstanding I have spoken unto you, rising early and speaking ; but ye hearkened not unto me.

I have sent also unto you all my servants the prophets , rising up early and sending \add them\add*, saying , Return ye now every man from his evil way , and amend your doings , and go not after other gods to serve them, and ye shall dwell in the land which I have given to you and to your fathers : but ye have not inclined your ear , nor hearkened unto me.
Because the sons of Jonadab the son of Rechab have performed the commandment of their father , which he commanded them; but this people hath not hearkened unto me:

Therefore thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God of hosts , the God of Israel ; Behold, I will bring upon Judah and upon all the inhabitants of Jerusalem all the evil that I have pronounced against them: because I have spoken unto them, but they have not heard ; and I have called unto them, but they have not answered. \p

¶ And Jeremiah said unto the house of the Rechabites , Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , the God of Israel ; Because ye have obeyed the commandment of Jonadab your father , and kept all his precepts , and done according unto all that he hath commanded you:

Therefore thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , the God of Israel ; Jonadab the son of Rechab shall not want a man to stand before me for ever.\f + \fr 35.19 \ft Jonadab…: Heb. There shall not a man be cut off from Jonadab the son of Rechab to stand, etc\f*
